contents.text: Welcome to BrightBytes in San Francisco, where we turn big data into big benefits for students.
For account and dashboard support, press 1.
For technical assistance and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a login issue with my BrightBytes dashboard
I can’t log into my account to view my students’ data dashboard.
My dashboard API integration isn’t pulling in real-time student analytics; I need technical troubleshooting.
I need help resetting my account password so I can access my dashboard.
I can't access my account dashboard; please help me troubleshoot the technical issue.

contents.text: For subscription details and billing inquiries, press 2.
One moment please while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Update my payment method and clarify the latest subscription charge
I need to review and update my subscription billing details.
I want to update the credit card on file for our enterprise subscription and get a detailed breakdown of last month’s invoice.
I’d like to check and update my billing information for my subscription.
I need details on my subscription plan and want to update my billing information.

contents.text: For information on our data visualization solutions, press 2.
To speak with a solutions specialist about our services, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a solutions specialist.

navigationGoals: Discuss integration options for data visualization with a specialist
I’d like to speak with a solutions specialist about your data visualization tools for my veteran education program.
I’d like to discuss integrating your data visualization SDK into our LMS with a solutions specialist.
I want to speak with someone about which data visualization service best fits my needs.
I’d like to speak with a specialist about integrating your visualization tools with my physics research data.

contents.text: To schedule a demo or consultation, press 2.
Thank you for your interest. Please hold while we connect you to our scheduling team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a demo of the data visualization platform for next week
I want to schedule a demo of your data visualization platform.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your data visualization platform to explore advanced customization options.
I’d like to schedule a demo appointment for your data visualization platform.
I want to schedule a demo of your data visualization platform at a convenient time.
